content.html: I am really disappointed to see prominent voices in our leadership at Salesforce promoting things that are the antithesis of our culture and our values. The fact that I can say so without expecting to get fired shows we're still different. Let's keep it that way.
content.value:
I am really disappointed to see prominent voices in our leadership at Salesforce promoting things that are the antithesis of our culture and our values.

The fact that I can say so without expecting to get fired shows we're still different. Let's keep it that way.
